dct_title_s: Map of Alaska showing the routes to the Klondike gold fields from the latest surveys to date
dct_description_sm: Includes chart showing distances from Juneau to Ft. Yukon via Chilkoot Pass and via White Pass and 2 ancillary maps, each in 2 sections: I. Yukon route -- II. Four routes via Juneau.
41 x 71 centimeters, on sheet 58 x 99 centimeters
